categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: Five Books in One

Star Wars: Five Books in One is a children's coloring and activity book featuring characters and scenes primarily from the Star Wars original trilogy and the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was produced by Bendon Publishing International, Inc. in 2017 as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi publishing program.
